settings.helpText: Name of the piece of content for identification within Contentful - use sensible names e.g. Campaign redirect.
Please specify redirect from path. URL’s should begin with a ‘/’ e.g. /campaignname
Please select a page to redirect to.  These links won't break if a page URL changes.
OR Redirect to an external site or a specific path.  These links may break if the destination page URL changes.
